name: webtools-init
description: Project initialization, health checks, registry management, and shared utility agents for the webtools website creation pipeline. Provides 8 commands (/webtools-init, /webtools-init-health, /webtools-init-rebuild, /webtools-init-status, /webtools-init-crawl, /webtools-init-compress, /webtools-init-load, /webtools-init-registry), 4 utility agents (web-crawler, document-compressor, prerequisite-loader, registry-updater), and canonical lifecycle and data model references used by all webtools plugins.

web-crawler.description: Unified web crawling with 7-method cascade. Crawl any URL and return clean markdown content with metadata.

document-compressor.description: Compress verbose webtools documents to reduce token consumption. Preserves all data points while rephrasing verbose passages.

prerequisite-loader.description: Load prerequisite documents for downstream plugins. Serves compressed versions when available.

registry-updater.description: Update project-registry.md after document production. Handles Document Log, Phase Log, and phase completion triggers.
